title: FS/T: T206's White Sox PRICES REDUCED
author: quinnsryche

posts.post_title: FS/T: T206's White Sox PRICES REDUCED
posts.post_content:
Hi. I have the last 3 cards from my collection that I want to sell to raise funds for another purchase. They are all T206 SGC graded White Sox.
Frank Owen SGC 60 Sweet Caporal 150 $70
Fielder Jones SGC 50 Piedmont 350 $50
Frank Smith (Chicago, White Cap) SGC 40 Sweet Caporal 350 $40
Postage $3 in bubble mailer with del. conf. Paypal, check, m.o. all fine. $150 for all 3 with postage included (that's $50 less than I paid). Would also consider trades for T206 HOF'ers I need, SGC 40 or better only or a T3 Turkey Red SGC 20 or better.
Thanks, Tony
